member.name: M:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ConsoleExtensions.PressAnyKey(System.String)
member.summary: Prompts for the user to hit a key to continue

member.name: M:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ConsoleExtensions.PressAnyKeyInColor(System.Drawing.Color,System.String)
member.summary: Prompts for the user to hit a key to continue. Displays prompt in specified color.

member.name: T:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1
member.summary: Settings used in various Display functions for Lists and prompts

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.UseColorPrompts
member.summary: If true, prompts will utilize Console.Color to be displayed.

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.ColorNoItemsInList
member.summary: Color used to display that there are no items in the list.

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.ColorListSelectionPrompt
member.summary: Color used to display the list prompt for selection

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.ListItemDisplay_AsString
member.summary: Method to be used to display each list item. Method should return a formatted string.

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.ListItemDisplay_Custom
member.summary:
Method to be used to display each list item. Method must write the item information to the console and return true;
If this and ListItemDisplay_AsString are set, this overrides

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.ItemSingularText
member.summary: This is what each item in the list is, such as car, person, name, etc. Should be in singular case.

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.MustSelectItem
member.summary: If true, then the user must select an item. If False, then the option X is available to exit without selecting.

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.CustomPrompt
member.summary: Prompt to be used at bottom of list to request user to select item. If not set then standard prompt used

member.name: P:Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions`1.AutoItemSelection
member.summary: If true, as soon as the user has entered enough digits to uniquely identify their selection, the result is returned without user needing to hit enter. Otherwise enter must be pressed.

member.name: T:SlugEnt.CommonFunctions.ListFX
member.summary: List related add on functions and extensions

member.name: F:SlugEnt.CommonFunctions.ListFX.LIST_SELECT_EXIT
member.summary: User selected to exit and thus nothing selected.

member.name: M:SlugEnt.CommonFunctions.ListFX.ClearInput(System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears the input line for list selection upon selection

member.name: M:SlugEnt.CommonFunctions.ListFX.AskUserToSelectItem``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},Slugent.CommonFunctions.ListPromptOptions{``0})
member.summary: Prompts user to choose an item from a list. Returns null if the user chose to exit or not select an item.
